vmstat visualizer

Japanese / 日本語

Github

What is this?

This tool can visualize your vmstat log file. You can see how resources (CPU, Memory...) on your server are used in a time span.

How can I use this?

1. Execute vmstat

Execute the following vmstat command on a server. Quit with Ctrl+C when you want to stop monitoring. vmstat -a -SM -w -t 1 | tee vmstat.log

2. Upload vmstat.log

Upload "vmstat.log" you got from step 1.

* The file you select is not actually uploaded to anywhere. It is processed locally on your computer.
End time must be later than start time
